Summary: Biochemical reaction from halothane to bromide, trifluoroacetyl chloride. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2E1.
Biochemical reaction from halothane to 2-chloro-1,1-difluoroethene, fluoride. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP2A6.
Biochemical reaction from halothane to 2-chloro-1,1,1-trifluoroethane. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2A6 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from trifluoroacetyl chloride to trifluoroacetic acid.
trifluoroacetyl chloride leads to Toxic liver disease.
CASP8 leads to Toxic liver disease.
